food.question: I am yellow and yummy, and monkeys love to peel me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐒 Monkeys eat me!
💛 I am the color of the sun.
🍌 I grow on trees.

food.question: I am round and red, and grow on a tree. Sometimes I am in pies. What am I?

hints.text: 🍎 Snow White liked to eat me.
❤️ I am the color of love.
🥧 You can make a yummy dessert with me.

food.question: I am long and orange, and bunnies love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 Bugs Bunny loves me!
🧡 I am the color of a sunset.
🌱 I grow under the ground.

food.question: I am white and you can drink me. Cows give me to you. What am I?

hints.text: 🥛 You can pour me in a glass
🐮 Comes from an animal that says 'moo'
🥣 I am good with cereal

food.question: I am small and green, and grow in a pod. You can eat me as a snack. What am I?

hints.text: 🟢 I'm a healthy snack.
🌱 I grow in a shell.
🫛 You can pop me out of my shell.

food.question: I am made of flour and baked in an oven. You can put butter on me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍞 I am a staple food for many.
🌾 I am made from grains.
🥪 You can make a sandwich with me.

food.question: I am a fruit that is orange on the outside and has juicy sections inside. I am a good source of vitamin C. What am I?

hints.text: 🍊 I share my name with a color!
☀️ You can drink my juice.
💪 I help you stay healthy.

food.question: I am small and round, sometimes red, sometimes green, and I grow in bunches on a vine. What am I?

hints.text: 🍇 You can make juice out of me!
🌿 I grow on a climbing plant.
🍷 Grown-ups sometimes use me to make a special drink.

food.question: I am made from milk and I come in many flavors. I am cold and sweet, and people love to eat me on a hot day. What am I?

hints.text: 🍦 I am a frozen treat.
👅 I can be vanilla, chocolate, or strawberry flavored.
☀️ I am perfect for a sunny day.

food.question: I am yellow, but not a banana. I am made from corn, and you can pop me. I am often eaten at the movies. What am I?

hints.text: 🍿 You can add butter and salt to me.
🌽 I come from a plant that grows tall.
🎬 People enjoy me while watching films.

bug.question: I am small and I crawl. I have six legs. What am I?

hints.text: 🤏 I am tiny!
🌱 I live outside.
👣 I walk on the ground.

bug.question: I have wings and I fly. I like to land on flowers. What am I?

hints.text: 💐 I like sweet things!
🦋 I am colorful.
☀️ I fly in the daytime.

bug.question: I make honey. I can sting you. What am I?

hints.text: 💛 I am yellow and black.
🍯 I live in a hive.
🐝 I buzz around.

bug.question: I am red with black spots. I am good luck. What am I?

hints.text: ⚫ I have dots.
🍀 Some people think I bring good luck.
🐞 I am a beetle.

bug.question: I jump really high and eat plants. I am green. What am I?

hints.text: 🌿 I like to eat leaves.
💚 My legs are long for jumping.
🦗 I make a chirping sound.

bug.question: I make a sticky web. I have eight legs. What am I?

hints.text: 🕸️ My home is made of silk.
🕷️ I trap other bugs.
🖐️🖐️ I have more legs than you!

bug.question: I carry food in a line with my friends. I live in a hill. What am I?

hints.text: 🐜 We are very small!
🏠 We live together in a big family.
💪 We are strong for our size.

bug.question: I make a pretty light in the night sky. What am I?

hints.text: 💡 I glow!
🌃 I come out when it's dark.
🪲 Some people call me a lightning bug.

bug.question: I eat wood and live in tunnels. I can be bad for houses. What am I?

hints.text: 🪵 I like to chew on trees.
🏠 Sometimes I live inside buildings.
🐜 I am a small, pale insect that lives underground.

bug.question: I am a master of disguise. I look just like a leaf. What am I?

hints.text: 🍃 You might not see me at first!
🌳 I live on trees.
🌿 I am green and flat, like a part of the plant.
